name: notion-crm-helper
description: Notion-powered CRM for managing contacts, opportunities, and activities — all managed conversationally through Claude.

hooks.prompt:
Check the current project directory for two required Notion CRM config files:
1. `.claude/settings.json` — must exist AND contain `NOTION_CRM_CONTACTS_DB_ID` in its `env` object
2. `.claude/crm-schema.json` — must exist

Use the Read tool to check each file. If either condition is not met, invoke /notion-crm-helper:setup before proceeding with anything else.
